name: Skeleton
description: Shoots arrows at Players and Golems. Can pick up weapons and armor. Drops bones and arrows on death.

name: Zombie
description: Walks towards and attacks Players and Golems. Can pick up weapons and armor. Drops rotten flesh on death.

name: Large Slime
description: Jumps towards and attacks Players and Golems. Splits into Medium Slime on death.

name: Medium Slime
description: Jumps towards and attacks Players and Golems. Splits into Small Slime on death.

name: Small Slime
description: Jumps towards Players and Golems. Drops slime balls on death.

name: Bat
description: Flies around randomly. Spawn in low light levels.

name: Squid
description: Swims around in water. Spawn in rivers and oceans. Drops ink sacs on death.

name: Sheep
description: Can be sheared for wool. Drop mutton and wool on death. Attracted to players holding wheat.

name: Zombified Piglin
description: Passive unless attacked. Drop gold upon death.

name: Enderman
description: Passive unless looked in the eye by a player. Drop ender pearls upon death.

name: Cow
description: Can be milked with a bucket. Drops raw beef and leather on death. Attracted to players holding wheat.

name: Pig
description: Drops raw porkchop on death. Attracted to players holding carrots.

name: Strider
description: Drops string on death. Rideable with a saddle.

name: Shulker
description: Drops shulker shells on death. Shoots projectiles at Players.

name: Hoglin
description: Drops raw porkchop and leather on death. Attacks players and piglins.

name: Wolf
description: Attack players if hit by player. Can be tamed with bones.

name: Axolotl
description: Can be tamed with buckets of fish. Attack fish and guardians.

name: Chicken
description: Drops raw chicken and feathers on death. Attracted to players holding seeds.
